attributes.action: Investigate Camelot. The Lotto has few jackpot winners since they added 10 balls
attributes.background: Camelot say they have made the draw more exciting with more winners. However this is only true if the draws roll over to a “must be won” draw. Which happens more than actually winning a standard 6 ball jackpot. There have been 3 jackpot winners in over 20 draws. How is this exciting?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the Camelot lottery, but are not sure what exactly you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
